title: Sanjun Gu Grafting Farmers Forum Presentation 2012

tasks.task: Host a session to update on tomato grafting research.
subtasks: Introduce the research on grafting compatibility with heirloom tomatoes.
Present survival rate statistics for grafted heirloom tomatoes.
Discuss the impact of rootstock on scion growth vigor.
Share results from high tunnel trials comparing single and double poly layers.
Highlight the potential benefits of grafting and double-layer poly tunnels.
Encourage farmers to consider grafting for soil-borne disease resistance and enhanced vigor.
Welcome participants to the afternoon session.
Introduce the agenda for the research update.
